channel.title: ~~~WaleedScape V2~~~ 100 extra features added! Bugs are fixed!
channel.description:
[ul]Hello moparscapians :D Well, im going to post some of the major updates that ive been editing in my server. People have been giving me PM's of when i will release my WaleedScape V2. well, i cant now, just check out my help topic. iknow its very simple. i used to know alot about bluurs, forgot everthing because i went on a 9month vacation to the middle east for a visit. so, anyways, in with the Development! :D
[size=24pt][center]Fixes!![/center][/size] [list] [li]Fixed the thieving issue, where u couldnt thieve on all NPC's[list] [li] fixed the Models, as some people know that my Cache was fucked[list] [li]Added a more complex herblore system[list] [li]fix the godsword dupes[list] [li]Added a better poisoning and PVP system[list] [li]started on KQ, will be adding both forms when i release[/li] [li]Started on SkillScapes (Thanks Valentino)[/li] [/list]Fixed NPC clipping 100%[/li] [li]added godwars models. (No animations because i cant fix my problem with anim header :([/li] [/list]Perfected the PVP skill[/li] [li]Removed Dragon Claws as i think Dclaws suck on 317[/li] [/list]Guthan now heals himself[/li] [li]Dharok now pwnz better with lower HP[/li] [/list]Added PVP armour (waiting to add correct anims)[/li] [li]Fixed the dragon Scimitar special[/li] [/list]Lots of other shit i cant be bothered to type[/li][/list]
[size=36pt][b]Video:[/b][/size] Uploading, gimme a min
Please, if u want Waleedscape V2 to come outquicker, please help me via teamviewer, after looking at this topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,446694.msg3278306.html#msg3278306
NOTE: for people who are saying im advertising: how the fuck could i be advertin when the link is in-forum? :confused:[/ul]

item.dc:creator: @justtesting justtesting
item.description:
@justtesting wrote:

[quote=“WaleedScape, post:6, topic:350333”][quote author=recker450 link=topic=446698.msg3278619#msg3278619 date=1279733463]
nice work =D
does 508 gs specs work as well?
[/quote]
im not going to add those because this server is just classical RS
thats the way i like it.[/quote]
i love you i prefer classic 2 like farming was the new skill lol. everything that keeps coming out is just boring and waste of time.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~WaleedScape V2~~~ 100 extra features added! Bugs are fixed!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[ul]Hello moparscapians
Well, im going to post some of the major updates that ive been editing in my server.
People have been giving me PM’s of when i will release my WaleedScape V2. well, i cant now, just check out my help topic. iknow its very simple. i used to know alot about bluurs, forgot everthing because i went on a 9month vacation to the middle east for a visit. so, anyways, in with the Development!

[size=24pt][center]Fixes!![/center][/size]
[list]
[li]Fixed the thieving issue, where u couldnt thieve on all NPC’s[list]
[li] fixed the Models, as some people know that my Cache was fucked[list]
[li]Added a more complex herblore system[list]
[li]fix the godsword dupes[list]
[li]Added a better poisoning and PVP system[list]
[li]started on KQ, will be adding both forms when i release[/li]
[li]Started on SkillScapes (Thanks Valentino)[/li]
[/list]Fixed NPC clipping 100%[/li]
[li]added godwars models. (No animations because i cant fix my problem with anim header :([/li]
[/list]Perfected the PVP skill[/li]
[li]Removed Dragon Claws as i think Dclaws suck on 317[/li]
[/list]Guthan now heals himself[/li]
[li]Dharok now pwnz better with lower HP[/li]
[/list]Added PVP armour (waiting to add correct anims)[/li]
[li]Fixed the dragon Scimitar special[/li]
[/list]Lots of other shit i cant be bothered to type[/li][/list]

[size=36pt]Video:[/size]
Uploading, gimme a min

Please, if u want Waleedscape V2 to come outquicker, please help me via teamviewer, after looking at this topic:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

NOTE: for people who are saying im advertising:
how the fuck could i be advertin when the link is in-forum? [/ul]
